alert.note: Alert for Lower Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 11 at 1:50PM MDT until June 11 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 8 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For today`s Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 105 degrees expected. For the Sunday Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 102 degrees. * WHERE...Lower Rio Grande Valley. * WHEN...For today`s Heat Advisory, until 8 PM MDT this evening. For Sunday`s Heat Advisory, from 1 PM until 8 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
